summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1684, for the improvement of North 49th Street, in the City of Seattle, from Interlake Avenue to Aurora Avenue, by attaching hydrants to the existing water mains, together with such gates, tees, connecting pipes, and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the reasonable fire protection of said district; under Ordinance No. 17719 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
